hidden.name: prestigeCompCombat
hidden.value: ${(totalAB >= 75 ? 5 : totalAB >= 50 ? 2 : 0) + (totalAN >= 75 ? 5 : totalAN >= 50 ? 2 : 0) + (totalAR >= 75 ? 5 : totalAR >= 50 ? 2 : 0) + (totalFE >= 75 ? 5 : totalFE >= 50 ? 2 : 0) + (totalPA >= 75 ? 5 : totalPA >= 50 ? 2 : 0) + (totalES >= 75 ? 5 : totalES >= 50 ? 2 : 0) + (totalTIR >= 75 ? 5 : totalTIR >= 50 ? 2 : 0)}$

hidden.name: reputation
hidden.value: ${(prestigeArmeDieu <= 5 ? 0 : prestigeArmeDieu <= 10 ? 5 : prestigeArmeDieu <= 15 ? 10 : prestigeArmeDieu <= 20 ? 15 : prestigeArmeDieu <= 25 ? 20 : prestigeArmeDieu <= 30 ? 25 : prestigeArmeDieu <= 35 ? 30 : prestigeArmeDieu <= 40 ? 35 : prestigeArmeDieu <= 45 ? 40 : 50) + 5 * floor(min(prestige,51)/10)}$

contents.value: ${fetchFromUuid(armeDieuUuid, 'name', 'Pas de nom')}$

contents.rollMessage:
${#concat( ?{diff:"Difficulté"|"0","Normal"|"50","Très facile"|"25","Facile"|"-25","Difficile"|"-50","Très difficile"}, ?{mod:"Modificateur"[number]|0}, fetchFromUuid(armeDieuUuid, "charge") ? (?{charge:"Charge"[check]}) : '' )}$ ${#competence:= switchCase(tactique,'AB',totalAB,'AN',totalAN,'AR',totalAR,'FE',totalFE,'PA',totalPA,'ES',totalES)}$ ${#xpAttr:= switchCase(tactique,'AB','xpFO','AN','xpAG','AR','xpRA','FE','xpRA','PA',totalPA,'ES',totalES)}$ ${#xpComp:= concat('xp', tactique)}$ ${#bonus:= equalText(fetchFromUuid(armeDieuUuid, "competence", ""), tactique) ? fetchFromUuid(armeDieuUuid, "modCompetence", 0) : 0}$ ${#tactiqueAdverse:= fallback(fetchFromActor('target', 'tactique'),'Aucune')}$ ${#tactMod:= 20}$ ${#tactMod:= and(equalText(tactique, 'AB'), not(equalText(tactiqueAdverse, 'Aucune'))) ? switchCase(tactiqueAdverse,'AB',10,'PA',10,'ES',-10,0) : tactMod}$ ${#tactMod:= and(equalText(tactique, 'AN'), not(equalText(tactiqueAdverse, 'Aucune'))) ? switchCase(tactiqueAdverse,'AB',10,'PA',10,'ES',-10,0) : tactMod}$ ${#tactMod:= and(equalText(tactique, 'AR'), not(equalText(tactiqueAdverse, 'Aucune'))) ? switchCase(tactiqueAdverse,'AB',10,'AN',10,0) : tactMod}$ ${#tactMod:= and(equalText(tactique, 'FE'), not(equalText(tactiqueAdverse, 'Aucune'))) ? switchCase(tactiqueAdverse,'AB',20,'AN',10,'FE',-20,'PA',10,0) : tactMod}$ ${#tactMod:= and(equalText(tactique, 'PA'), not(equalText(tactiqueAdverse, 'Aucune'))) ? switchCase(tactiqueAdverse,'AB',20,'AN',10,'AR',-10,'FE',-10,0) : tactMod}$ ${#tactMod:= and(equalText(tactique, 'ES'), not(equalText(tactiqueAdverse, 'Aucune'))) ? switchCase(tactiqueAdverse,'AB',10,'AR',-10,'FE',-10,0) : tactMod}$ ${#seuil:= max(competence + diff + mod + bonus + tactMod, 5)}$ ${#roll:= [1d100]}$ ${#ru:= roll%10}$ ${#result:= 0}$ ${#result:=(or(roll == 100, roll > seuil) ? 0 : 1)}$ ${#result:=(and(result==0, ru==1) ? -1 : result)}$ ${#result:=(and(result==1, ru==0) ? 2 : result)}$ ${#switchCase(result,-1,'Echec critique',0,'Echec',1,'Réussite',2,'Réussite critique','autre')}$ ${#or(result == -1, result == 2) ? setPropertyInEntity('self', xpAttr, concat(xpAttr,'+1')) : ''}$ ${#or(result == -1, result == 2) ? setPropertyInEntity('self', xpComp, concat(xpComp,'+1')) : ''}$ ${#dommage:= fetchFromUuid(armeDieuUuid, "dommages")}$ ${#dommage:= and(result == 2, equalText(tactique, 'AB')) ? dommage+2 : dommage}$ ${#dommage:= and(result == 2, or(or(equalText(tactique, 'AN'), equalText(tactique, 'FE')), equalText(tactique, 'PA'))) ? dommage+1 : dommage}$ ${#dommage:= and(result == 1, equalText(tactique, 'AB')) ? dommage+1 : dommage}$ ${#dommage:= and(result == 1, equalText(tactique, 'AR')) ? dommage-1 : dommage}$ ${#dommage:= charge ? (result == 2 ? dommage+2 : (result == 1 ? dommage+1 : dommage)) : dommage}$ ${#dommage:= totalFO<=7 ? dommage-1 : and(totalFO>=15, totalFO<=20) ? dommage+1 : totalFO>=21 ? dommage+2 : dommage}$ ${#dommage:= dommage<1 ? 1 : dommage}$ ${#dommage:= dommage>17 ? 17 : dommage}$ ${#blessures:= 0 }$ ${#blessures:= ru==0 ? switchCase(dommage,1,2,2,2,3,3,4,5,5,10,6,15,7,20,8,25,9,30,10,35,11,40,12,45,13,50,14,55,15,60,16,65,17,70) : blessures}$ ${#blessures:= ru==1 ? switchCase(dommage,1,1,2,1,3,1,4,1,5,1,6,2,7,2,8,3,9,3,10,4,11,4,12,5,13,5,14,6,15,6,16,7,17,7) : blessures}$ ${#blessures:= ru==2 ? switchCase(dommage,1,1,2,1,3,1,4,1,5,2,6,3,7,4,8,5,9,6,10,7,11,8,12,9,13,10,14,11,15,12,16,13,17,14) : blessures}$ ${#blessures:= ru==3 ? switchCase(dommage,1,1,2,1,3,1,4,2,5,3,6,5,7,6,8,8,9,9,10,11,11,12,12,14,13,15,14,17,15,18,16,20,17,21) : blessures}$ ${#blessures:= ru==4 ? switchCase(dommage,1,1,2,1,3,2,4,2,5,4,6,6,7,8,8,10,9,12,10,14,11,16,12,18,13,20,14,22,15,24,16,26,17,28) : blessures}$ ${#blessures:= ru==5 ? switchCase(dommage,1,1,2,1,3,2,4,3,5,5,6,8,7,10,8,13,9,15,10,18,11,20,12,23,13,25,14,28,15,30,16,33,17,35) : blessures}$ ${#blessures:= ru==6 ? switchCase(dommage,1,1,2,2,3,2,4,3,5,6,6,9,7,12,8,15,9,18,10,21,11,24,12,27,13,30,14,33,15,36,16,39,17,42) : blessures}$ ${#blessures:= ru==7 ? switchCase(dommage,1,1,2,2,3,3,4,4,5,7,6,11,7,14,8,18,9,21,10,25,11,28,12,32,13,35,14,39,15,42,16,46,17,49) : blessures}$ ${#blessures:= ru==8 ? switchCase(dommage,1,1,2,2,3,3,4,4,5,8,6,12,7,16,8,20,9,24,10,28,11,32,12,36,13,40,14,44,15,18,16,52,17,56) : blessures}$ ${#blessures:= ru==9 ? switchCase(dommage,1,2,2,2,3,3,4,5,5,9,6,14,7,18,8,23,9,27,10,32,11,36,12,41,13,45,14,50,15,54,16,59,17,63) : blessures}$ ${#dizaine:= floor(roll/10)}$ ${#dizaine:= dizaine == 10 ? 0 : dizaine}$ ${#loc:= ru*10+dizaine}$ ${#loc:= loc>90 ? "Jambe gauche" : loc>80 ? "Jambe droite" : loc>65 ? "Abdomen" : loc>50 ? "Bras gauche" : loc>35 ? "Bras droit" : loc>10 ? "Torse" : "Tête"}$ ${#xpComp:= concat('xp', tactique)}$ ${#bonusComp:= concat('bonus', tactique)}$ ${#newXp:= or(result == -1, result == 2) ? setPropertyInEntity('self', xpComp, concat(xpComp,'+1')) : ''}$ ${#augmentComp:= false}$ ${#augmentComp:= and(competence < 25, newXp == 1) ? true : augmentComp}$ ${#augmentComp:= and(competence < 50, newXp == 2) ? true : augmentComp}$ ${#augmentComp:= and(competence >= 50, newXp == 5) ? true : augmentComp}$ ${#augmentComp ? setPropertyInEntity('self', bonusComp, concat(bonusComp, '+5')) : "pas d'augmentation de la compétence"}$ ${#augmentComp ? setPropertyInEntity('self', xpComp, 0) : "pas de remise à zéro de l'xp de la compétence"}$ ${#xpCar:= switchCase(tactique,'AB','xpFO','AN','xpAG','AR','xpRA','FE','xpRA','PA','xpRA','ES','xpRA')}$ ${#bonusCar:= replace(xpCar, 'xp', 'bonus')}$ ${#totalCar:= replace(xpCar, 'xp', 'total')}$ ${#totalCar:= recalculate(concat("$", "{", totalCar, "}", "$"))}$ ${#newXp:= or(result == -1, result == 2) ? setPropertyInEntity('self', xpCar, concat(xpCar,'+1')) : ''}$ ${#newXp:= (or(result == -1, result == 2) ? setPropertyInEntity('self', xpCar, concat(xpCar,'+1')) : 0)}$ ${#augmentCar:= newXp == totalCar ? true : false}$ ${#augmentCar ? setPropertyInEntity('self', bonusCar, concat(bonusCar,'+1')) : "pas d'augmentation de la caractéristique"}$ ${#augmentCar ? setPropertyInEntity('self', xpCar, 0) : "pas de remise à zéro de l'xp de la caractéristique"}$
